commodities.name: Sparkle Rocks
commodities.description: Unprocessed minerals that glitter enticingly. Heavy but cheap. Mining worlds have mountains of the stuff.

commodities.name: Space Wheat
commodities.description: Genetically modified to grow in low gravity. Tastes like regular wheat but with a hint of existential dread.

commodities.name: Gloop Juice
commodities.description: Refined hydrogen slurry. Gas giants produce it cheaply. Don't drink it. Seriously.

commodities.name: Clanky Bits
commodities.description: Gears, servos, and mysterious components. Industrial planets churn these out by the shipload.

commodities.name: Glowing Pills
commodities.description: Advanced pharmaceuticals. The glow is supposedly harmless. Research outposts synthesize the good stuff.

commodities.name: Blinky Boxes
commodities.description: Cutting-edge electronics with lots of blinking lights. Nobody knows what most of them do.

commodities.name: Fun Cubes
commodities.description: Holographic entertainment devices. Colonists pay premium prices to forget they live in space.

commodities.name: Ancient Junk
commodities.description: Mysterious relics from... somewhere. Scientists insist they're valuable. Only found at outer research stations.

commodities.name: Shiny Things
commodities.description: Jewelry, rare wines, and imported delicacies. Rich colonists can't resist them.

commodities.name: Definitely Not Illegal
commodities.description: Packages marked 'TOTALLY LEGAL GOODS.' Contents unknown. High profit, higher risk.
